content: pineapple lace summer top items needed hook 4 mm yarn debbie bliss prima 80% bamboo 20% merino wool aprox 3 skeins 300 meters total  chose this yarn because it has a slight sheen to it and it drapes fantastically 1 button bikini top make 2 in order to make it a custom fit measure from underboob up to middle of nipple then chain as many as needed to reach that length then chain an extra 2 i did 16 chain + 2 chain i ll use these numbers in the rest of the bikini top pattern the ch2 turning chain doesn t count as a stitch half_double_crochet in 3rd chain from hook and across til second to last chain 15 half_double_crochet 1 chain left unworked work 3 half_double_crochet in last chain mark middle half_double_crochet work 15 half_double_crochet across the opposite side of the starting chain chain 2 turn rest of bikini top half_double_crochet in first st and every st across until you reach the marked stitch half_double_crochet 3 in marked stitch mark middle half_double_crochet half_double_crochet til end chain 2 turn keep working the row until you have reached the size you want to have when you fasten_off leave a long tail for attaching the tops to the body i did 12 row with a 4 mm hook and debbie bliss prima you can use any yarn thickness and hook size with this pattern as long as you start with the right chain length and work enough row just be sure that you use a hook/yarn combo that will give a dense enough fabric so as not to be see-through body shell 2dc ch2 2dc all in same st/space beg-shell beginning shell ch3 double_crochet ch2 2dc all in same st/space
